alert.note: Alert for Aitkin; Pine (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 30 at 3:28AM CDT until May 30 at 4:15AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Duluth MN has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Aitkin County in east central Minnesota... Northwestern Pine County in east central Minnesota... * Until 415 AM CDT. * At 327 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southeast of Isle, or 18 miles west of Hinckley, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Spotters reported one inch hail near Ogilvie. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... McGrath around 345 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
